abstract: Many residents of Nichols, small town in upstate New York, are pinning their hopes for economic salvation on Tioga Downs, a refurbished harness racing track and slot machine parlor; locals hope site will get a chance to expand to a full casino if statewide referendum authorizing up to seven full-scale casinos around New York State is passed by voters.
lead_paragraph: Nichols, N.Y., which has a small racing track and slot machine parlor nearby, hopes the site will get a chance to expand to a full casino if Proposal 1 is approved by voters Tuesday.

headline.main: Referendum on Casinos Stirs Hopes in Tiny Town
